name: Macallan 18
description: A luxurious single malt Scotch whisky aged for 18 years, known for its rich flavors of dried fruits, spice, and oak.

name: Yamazaki 12
description: A Japanese single malt whisky with elegant notes of peach, vanilla, and mizunara oak.

name: Buffalo Trace
description: A classic Kentucky straight bourbon with notes of vanilla, caramel, and oak.

name: Lagavulin 16
description: An intensely flavored Islay single malt with rich peat smoke, maritime notes, and sweet intensity.

name: Redbreast 12
description: A single pot still Irish whiskey with complex spice and fruit notes.

name: Glenfiddich 15
description: A Speyside single malt aged in three different casks, offering honey, vanilla, and rich fruit notes.

name: Blanton's Original
description: A premium single barrel bourbon with notes of citrus, caramel, and warm spices.

name: Highland Park 18
description: An Orkney single malt with perfect balance of sweet honey and delicate smoke.

name: Nikka From The Barrel
description: A complex Japanese whisky blend with bold flavors of winter spice and oak.

name: Glenmorangie Signet
description: A unique Highland single malt made with roasted chocolate malt barley.
